description.loctext: Common name service and name service cache configuration data as described in nscd.conf(4).
Enable per-user lookups
Per user nscd (idle) time to live
Log file location
Debugging/Log level flags (or'd together)
All Error Levels combined
Can't find
Log Level Debug
Log Level Error
Log Level Warning
Log Level Info
Log Level Notice
Log Level Alert
Log Level Critical
Components to debug (or'd)
All Subsystems
Cache Component
Switch Engine
Nscd to Library Frontend
Self Credentials engine
Admin component
Switch configuration code
SMF state monitor
NSS state monitor
Getent contexts
Access (locking) Subsystem
int_addr pool
Dependent SMF service status check interval
Default cache configuration data as described in nscd.conf(4).
Enable caching for (default) database(s)
Cache item - positive time to live
Cache item - negative time to live
Cache item - keep hot count
Database - Check for local files changes
Interval (in seconds) to check local files database
Maximum number of cache entries for this database
